DOC.brief_summary: This is a open label, single center, single oral dose, study of PRT054021, in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label, Single-Dose, Mass-Balance Study to Assess the Disposition of 14C-Labeled PRT054021 in Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult men ages of 19 and 55 years old, inclusive weighs at least 132 lbs Clinically significant comorbid disease History of substance abuse Hemoglobin less than 12.0 g/dl
